column5: Where is the best place to stay around Tobin. We would like to be on the lake but if there are better place off the lake that's fine.

HI. we went there once. we stayed on tobin but the resort was in like a small town of resorts. the brochure they send makes it look like they are isolated but NOT. THE Lake is big and open, if its windy you will not get out. if this is the case i would stay closer to town and nearer the river. good luck.
Are you fishing the lake or the river Do you want the convience of town or a little more out of the way
What would you recommend? We were thinking the lake but maybe the river?

If you want walleye The River ( 4 to 8 ft snell #8 or #6 Gamma and a leech) all you need no secrets up there tobin lake resort Can catch walleye on the lake also but know for monster pike 20 odd miles out to the flats Bring anything big (musky Stuff) Around town Macswaneys cabins , Kingfisher motor inn tobin lake motel all are not bad Just go onto nipawins town website for lodgeing For Food go to Venice House in town(GOOD!) 99.7% Of people stay in town and go for them huge eyes What time of year are you Going?
Where going in the fall. thanks for the info.
